# Mercle Assignment

## Steps to setup locally:
1. Clone the repository - <b>git clone https://github.com/abhigurjeet/mercle-assignment.git</b>
2. Run the command (to install all the required libraries) - <b>npm i</b>
3. To run it locally: <b>npm start</b>
